description:
What do you do with non-cancellable reservations if you can`t make it? Give them to someone else! Looks like the bands are about to go on an unexpected hot springs vacation!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Nonbiri Shite Ite Yoi no Deshouka
Should We Be Lounging Around Right Now?
のんびりしていてよいのでしょうか
